description: A story about a snowman choosing his nose.
title: The Nose-Picking Adventure
n_1: Simon Snowman stands before a pile of carrots, pondering.
c1_1: Which one of you will be my perfect nose?
n_2: Carrie Carrot, a charming carrot among the pile, catches his eye.
c1_2: Yes, I need the right one to complete my look!
c2_2: How about me? I think I'd fit just right!
n_3: Simon tries fitting Carrie as his nose.
c2_3: I knew it! I'm not just any carrot, after all.
n_4: Simon, now with Carrie as his nose, smiles contentedly.
c2_4: And I've found my place in the world!
